name: Trial By Heresy
description:
Trial By Heresy is a GM-less tabletop game where followers of a God call Them down from Their living space to question their fitness to rule. It is for 2-5 players, with one player playing the God and others playing the God's Sages. Game length is approximately one 2-3 hour session, though alternate rules make the game run much longer.

This game can be played with or without dice, depending on player wishes, and includes safety mechanics. It can be played as either a comedy or drama game, with varying levels of seriousness depending on what the players are feeling like.

Inspired by Nobilis, the Ace Attorney games, and others.
